Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, California, North Ave, Western and Armitage due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Armitage, California, North Ave, Western and Armitage, due to street blockage near Armitage/Washtenaw.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Damen
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 83rd, Western and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 83rd, Western and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Damen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
